root.name: OutRun 2006: Coast 2 Coast
root.description: OutRun 2006: Coast 2 Coast is a racing game developed by Sumo Digital and published by Sega for the Xbox, PlayStation 2, PlayStation Portable and Windows PC. It is chiefly based upon OutRun 2 SP (which itself received a Japanese-only PS2 port), with the addition of five new cars (two of which are from OutRun 2 on the Xbox), rebalanced and added features and a "Coast 2 Coast" mode.
